evidence.text: 2022-08-08 | 213   Unopposed MOTION for Attorney Fees by Eric Aguirre, Juan Hernandez, DeQuan Kirkwood, Manuel Trevino, Kent Wheatfall, filed. Motion Docket Date 8/29/2022. (Attachments: # 1 Declaration of Leonora Cohen, # 2 Affidavit of Bryn Bridley, # 3 Exhibit A to Bridley Affidavit, # 4 Exhibit B to Bridley Affidavit, # 5 Proposed Order)(Rotman, Anna) (Entered: 08/08/2022)

extracted.value: On Aug. 8, 2022, the plaintiffs filed an unopposed Motion for Attorney Fees, requesting the court award attorney fees and costs to the plaintiffs. The motion was docketed on 8/29/2022 and filed by Eric Aguirre, Juan Hernandez, DeQuan Kirkwood, Manuel Trevino, and Kent Wheatfall.

evidence.text: 2022-08-22 | 214   MOTION to Intervene by Amir Ben-David, filed. Motion Docket Date 9/12/2022. (AkeitaMichael, 4) (Entered: 08/22/2022)

extracted.value: On Aug. 22, 2022, Amir Ben‑David filed a Motion to Intervene, seeking to join the litigation as a party. The motion was docketed on 9/12/2022.

evidence.text: 2022-09-07 | 215   ORDER granting 213 Motion for Attorney Fees and Costs. (Signed by Judge Kenneth M Hoyt) Parties notified.(chorace) (Entered: 09/07/2022)

extracted.value: On Sep. 7, 2022, the court granted the plaintiffs' Motion for Attorney Fees and Costs (Motion 213), ordering the defendants to pay the requested fees and costs.

evidence.text: 2022-09-08 | 216   ORDER denying 214 Motion to Intervene. (Signed by Judge Kenneth M Hoyt) Parties notified.(chorace) (Entered: 09/08/2022)

extracted.value: On Sep. 8, 2022, the court denied Amir Ben‑David's Motion to Intervene (Motion 214), refusing to allow him to join the case.
